author: Paul Rankin
method: Place a bamboo steamer over a pan of simmering water. Add the salmon fillet, spring onions and tomatoes and steam for 6-8 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through. Meanwhile, mix the soy sauce, lemon juice, vegetable oil and sesame oil in a bowl. Remove the salmon and vegetables from the steamer and transfer to a serving plate. Drizzle the sauce over and serve.
ingredients: 150g/5¼oz salmon fillet,  2 spring onions, sliced lengthways,  1 tomato, cut into quarters ,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  ½ lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 tsp sesame oil
